mapper.select: SELECT t_id tid,t_name tName,parent_id parentId FROM sys_tenant
mapper.sql: t_id, parent_id, ancestors, t_name, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, t_type, tenant, description
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_tenant
t_id,
parent_id,
ancestors,
t_name,
status,
del_flag,
create_by,
create_time,
update_by,
update_time,
t_type,
tenant,
description,

mapper.update:
update sys_tenant
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_name = #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
tenant = #{tenant,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_tenant set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_name = #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tenant = #{tenant,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
